title: Kate Ferdinand renames the dog she shared with ex Dan Edgar giving it her marital surname
text:

Newlywed Kate Ferdinand has renamed her chihuahua Ronnie so that his surname is the same as hers.

Katie, 28, married footballer Rio Ferdinand, 40, last month and changed her name from Wright to Ferdinand.

Kate got Ronnie with her then boyfriend Dan Edgar, when they both starred in The Only Way is Essex, and he appeared in several episodes with the couple.

During their rocky relationship, Dan brought Kate a teddy with his face on it, to give to Ronnie so that "if it all goes t***s up he's going to remember me".

Following Kate and Rio's star studded glamorous wedding at a five star hotel in Turkey, Kate celebrated her pup turning four with an Instagram post where she also announced his name change.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"RONNIE IS 4 TODAY", she wrote.

"Anyone that knows me knows how much I love this little pooch ... he’s also had a name change ... his first birthday as Ronnie Ferdinand", she added.

On her story, Kate reminisced about when adorable Ronnie was even tinier.

She posted throwback photos to the day she got him, as well as several other photos of the pup with her and with her new hubbie Rio.

Noticeably absent from any of the photos was her ex Dan.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Ronnie seems to have happily welcomed Rio into the family judging by the picture of the two of them cuddled up on the sofa.

Kate is now stepmum to Rio's daughter Tia, 8, as well as his two sons Lorenz, 13, and Tate, 11, who he shared with his late wife, Rebecca, who died of cancer in 2015.

Tia walked down the aisle before Kate on the day, while the boys walked her down the aisle.

(Image: Instagram)

Rio told OK! magazine : “I cried as soon as the day started. Seeing Tia walk up the aisle before Kate set me off. It was just so emotional.

"There was just no going back on the emotion, that’s why I had to keep my shades on!

"Seeing Tate and Lorenz walk Kate down the aisle was particularly poignant and we wouldn’t have wanted to do it any other way.

"They were so proud and they couldn’t wait to do that, they felt important."
description: Kate has changed her chihuahua Ronnie's surname to Ferdinand now that she is married to Rio
